attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Providing murderer's which have been 100% convicted of their said crime who are locked up in our already over-populated prisons seem to be rewarded with TV's Playstations,DVD's etc all at the taxpayers expense for numerous years,the money used for this is in its-self a crime could be put to better use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
